alert.note: Alert for McPherson; Rice (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 17 at 10:48PM CDT until May 18 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN MCPHERSON AND NORTHERN RICE COUNTIES... At 1048 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles south of Abilene to 7 miles south of Carlton to 7 miles northwest of Mcpherson, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mcpherson, Lindsborg, Galva, Canton, Marquette, Little River, Bushton, Geneseo, Windom, Frederick, Roxbury and Mcpherson Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
